explanation: [0-0] A man is sitting at a table, holding a small jar of chocolate spread in his left hand and a piece of chocolate in his right hand, smiling. He is wearing a brown short-sleeved shirt and a red headscarf. There are many decorative paintings on the wall behind him, and a TV on the TV cabinet. The screen displays the caption "0% diabetes" in black text on a white background.
